data.title: Parks and Recreation Programs
data.meta_description: Bartow County Parks & Recreation: Connecting People, Enriching Lives Outdoors
data.text:
Programs

Program Listing:

Cheerleading

Basketball

Football

Baseball

Softball

Wrestling

Volleyball

Adult Softball

Soccer

back to top

CHEERLEADING

Season runs from August-November

Registration begins each July 1st - July 31st

Practices and games are held at Hamilton Crossing Park and Old Cass High

Coaches are NYSCA Certified

AGE DIVISIONS AND REGISTRATION FEES

Ages 6-12 (Age prior to Sept.-1)

Cost $100

Includes Cheer Uniform.

back to top

YOUTH BASKETBALL

Registrations are held each year beginning in October

Age Control Date: September 1st

Practices begin mid-November with games beginning December 1st

Coaches are NYSCA Certified

Basketball runs from November to February.

The league is played under GRPA guidelines. Games are played at Hamilton Crossing Park, Old Cass High School, Manning Mill Park, and South Bartow Youth Facility.

The coaches will draft their teams.

4 & 5 year old instructional league - Co-ed, Coached by Kendra Gilliam: $50

Players will learn basic basketball skills, no games.

This league plays for six (6) Saturdays beginning the 2nd Saturday of December and ending in January.

6 year old Basketball League $50

8 & Under Boys $90

8 & Under Girls $90

10 & Under Boys $90

10 & Under Girls $90

12 & Under Boys $90

12 & Under Girls $90

14 & Under Boys $90

14 & Under Girls $90

17 & Under Boys $90

17 & Under Girls $90

Jerseys Are Provided

back to top

YOUTH FOOTBALL

Season runs from August-November

Registration begins each July 1st - July 31st

Age Control Date: Sept. 1st

Practices and games are conducted at Hamilton Crossing Park and Old Cass High

AGE DIVISIONS AND REGISTRATION FEES

5 & 6 Year Old Flag Football $65

7& 8 Year Old Tackle Football $100

9 & 10 Year Old Tackle Football $100

11 & 12 Year Old Tackle Football $100

Registration includes: Jerseys and Mouth Guards

All Protective Equipment Is On Loan And To Be Returned At The End Of The Season

back to top

YOUTH SOCCER

Spring league runs from March-May

Registrations are conducted each January and February

Practices and games are played at Hamilton Crossing Park and Old Cass

Age Control Date: September 1st

Coaches are NYSCA Certified

AGE DIVISIONS AND REGISTRATION FEES

4 & 5 Year Old Co-Ed $90

6 & 7 Year Old Co-Ed $90

8 & 9 Year Old Co-Ed $90

10 & 11 Year Old Co-Ed $90

Jersey and shorts are Provided

Fall soccer league runs from August-November

Registrations are conducted each July-August

AGE DIVISIONS AND REGISTRATION FEES

4 Year Old Fall Soccer $90

6 & Under Boys $90

6 & Under Girls $90

8 & Under Boys $90

8 & Under Girls $90

10 & Under Boys $90

10 & Under Girls $90

12 & Under Boys $90

12 & Under Girls $90

14 & Under Fall Soccer $90

Jersey and shorts are Provided

back to top

YOUTH SOFTBALL

Spring season runs from March-June

Registrations are conducted each January and February

Age Control Date: September 1st for GRPA (10 & under) January 1st for Little League (12 & up)

Coaches are NYSCA Certified

Participants play GRPA, Dizzy Dean, & Little League Softball guidelines.

Games are played at Hamilton Crossing, Manning Mill Park and Stars Pre-K Field

AGE DIVISIONS AND REGISTRATION FEES

6 & Under $75

8 & Under $85

10 & Under $95

12 & Under $95

14 & Under $100

15/16 year old $100

back to top

YOUTH BASEBALL

Spring season runs from March-May, participants play by GRPA & Little League Baseball guidelines. Practices and Games are played at Hamilton Crossing and Manning Mill Park.

Registrations are conducted each January and February

Age Control Date: September 1st

Coaches are NYSCA Certified

AGE DIVISIONS AND REGISTRATION FEES

Tee-Ball (Ages 3 & 4) $75

5 & 6 Year Old League $85

7 & 8 Year Old League $85

9/10 Year Old League $95

11/12 year Old League $95

13/14 & Year Old League $100

15/16 Year Old League $100

Wrestling

Runs from November - February

Registration runs from September 1st - November 1st

Ages: Kindergarten - 5th Grade

Cost: $95

Amateur Athletic Union (AAU) wrestling held at Hamilton Crossing Gym (31 Beavers Dr. Cartersville, Ga 30120)

Coach: Will Rogers

Teaching discipline, strong work ethic, competitive mind set, mental toughness, physical fitness, and team building.

back to top

Volleyball

Sign-ups July - August

Age Control Date: September 1st

Coaches are NYSCA Certified

Now offering from age 9-14

Cost: $85

Includes shirt and knee pads

back to top

Adult Softball

Fee: $400 Team Entry

Games start in March

Locations: Rex Moncus Park

Leagues offered:

Co-Ed

Men and Women's Open

Men and Women's Church
